events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on March 30, involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on the details provided by the claimant.
An agent with experience in vehicle collision claims was assigned promptly to handle the customer's case.
The claim has been formally acknowledged and the customer received a confirmation email outlining the next steps.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report related to the accident.
All requested documents, including detailed pictures of the car damage and the official accident report, were submitted on time.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and police report to verify claim validity.
The vehicle collision claim investigation concluded with a determination that the claim meets policy terms for coverage.
A settlement amount was proposed to the claimant, covering the estimated repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim was approved following customer acceptance of the settlement offer without disputes or delays.
Payment was successfully issued to the claimant and the car repair shop as per the agreed settlement terms.
The claim file was officially closed after confirming that all repairs were completed and payment processed.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for record keeping and future reference if needed.
